articles.title: Droupadi Murmu "Represents Very Evil Philosophy Of India": Congress Leader
articles.description: Congress leader Ajoy Kumar has kicked off a controversy, saying that NDA's presidential candidate Droupadi Murmu represents a "very evil philosophy of India" and should not be made a "symbol of Adivasi".
articles.content:
If elected, Droupadi Murmu will be the first tribal President of India.

articles.title: Crocodile Was Captured In Belief That Boy Was Alive. What Happened Next
articles.description: A crocodile was captured in Madhya Pradesh and had its legs tied and mouth restrained as the villagers, who believed that the reptile had swallowed a child, tried recovering his body from its stomach.
articles.content:
The crocodile was later released away from the human habitation.
